Episodes.Title: Your Shoe's Untied
Episodes.Plot: SpongeBob forgets how to tie his shoes, so he must re-learn how. But no one else knows how, either.
Episodes.Writer: Merriweather Williams, Paul Tibbitt

Episodes.Title: Squid's Day Off
Episodes.Plot: Mr. Krabs gets rushed to the hospital after a freak dime-rescuing attempt, and puts Squidward incharge of the Krusty Krab. Squidward decides to take the day off, but then keeps on worrying about what could happen to SpongeBob who's alone at the Krusty Krab.
Episodes.Writer: Merriweather Williams, Paul Tibbitt
Episodes.GuestStars: Corky Carroll,  Brad Abrell,  Steven Jay Blum

Episodes.Title: Something Smells
Episodes.Plot: SpongeBob eats a peanut onion sundae and acquires a hideous case of bad breath. And he can't quite understand why everyone runs away from him whenever he talks to them.
Episodes.Writer: Merriweather Williams

Episodes.Title: Bossy Boots
Episodes.Plot: When Pearl remodels the Krusty Krab into a hip local hangout, SpongeBob worries about the fate of the original restaurant (not to mention, his position as Fry Cook!).
Episodes.Writer: Merriweather Williams

Episodes.Title: Big Pink Loser
Episodes.Plot: Patrick gets an award and shows everybody in town, but when he shows SpongeBob he finds out that he got by mistake and it's SpongeBob's. So he starts copying SpongeBob and says he's not stopping until he gets as many awards as SpongeBob has.
Episodes.Writer: Jay Lender, William Reiss, Merriwether Williams

Episodes.Title: Bubble Buddy
Episodes.Plot: SpongeBob creates a buddy out of bubbles, when none of his friends have time to play with him. However, SpongeBob and his new "Bubble Buddy" soon become the focus of intense aggravation by the citizens of Bikini Bottom.
Episodes.Writer: Jay Lender, William Reiss, Doug Lawrence

Episodes.Title: Mermaid Man & Barnacle Boy III
Episodes.Plot: Mermaid Man and Barnacle Boy decide to go on vacation, but unfortunately they don't have anyone to look after the Merma-lair, so they ask SpongeBob and Patrick to look after it. However, they accidentally release Man Ray from a prison made of frozen tartar sauce.
Episodes.Writer: Merriweather Williams, Paul Tibbitt

Episodes.Title: Squirrel Jokes
Episodes.Plot: SpongeBob tells jokes in a talent show at the Krusty Krab, but ends up saying jokes about squirrels, which makes Sandy mad.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Tibbitt, Merriwether Williams

Episodes.Title: Dying For Pie
Episodes.Plot: It's employee brotherhood day and Squidward has nothing to give to SpongeBob, so he accidentally gives SpongeBob a pie bomb. Squidward spends the whole day with SpongeBob because SpongeBob only has one day to live.
Episodes.Writer: Aaron Springer, C.H. Greenblatt, Merriwether Willi

Episodes.Title: Imitation Krabs
Episodes.Plot: In another attempt to steal the Krabby Patty formula, Plankton makes a robot that looks just like Mr. Krabs. But in order to get the formula, he will have to do some odd things as part of the "secret handshake."
Episodes.Writer: Aaron Springer, Merriweather Williams, C. H. Green
Episodes.GuestStars: Tom Kenny,  Sirena Irwin,  Dee Bradley Baker,  Marion Ross

Episodes.Title: Wormy
Episodes.Plot: Sandy is going away and calls SpongeBob and Patrick to take care of her pets. One of them is a worm, and SpongeBob and Patrick have fun with it all day long, until the next day when it transforms into a butterfly and everybody in town gets scared of it.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Tibbitt, Merriwether Williams, Mr. Lawrence

Episodes.Title: Patty Hype
Episodes.Plot: The Krusty Krab hasn't had costumers in weeks, so SpongeBob comes up with an idea, but Mr. Krabs and Squidward laugh at the idea. So SpongeBob opens his own restaurant and becomes a huge success in Bikini Bottom.
Episodes.Writer: Paul Tibbitt, Merriwether Williams, Mr. Lawrence

Episodes.Title: Survival of the Idiots
Episodes.Plot: Despite Sandy's warning, SpongeBob and Patrick sneak into her treedome, during a terrible snowstorm and since the doorknob is frozen, SpongeBob and Patrick realize they have to wait until spring. Will SpongeBob and Patrick be able to survive the entire winter? Or will Sandy, and the cold weather, stop them first?
Episodes.Writer: C. H. Greenblatt, Merriweather Williams, Aaron Spr

Episodes.Title: Dumped
Episodes.Plot: Suddenly, Gary seems to be hanging out with Patrick more than SpongeBob. SpongeBob thinks it's because he loves Patrick more. But, what's the real reason that Gary is attached to Patrick all of a sudden?
Episodes.Writer: C. H. Greenblatt, Merriweather Williams, Aaron Spr

Episodes.Title: Grandma's Kisses
Episodes.Plot: SpongeBob asks his grandma not to kiss him because her public displays of affection are embarrassing, then when Spongebob and Patrick try to tell her they are men, Patrick ends up acting like a baby and in the end Spongebob can't take it and says its okay to be kissed by his grandma.
Episodes.Writer: Merriweather Williams, Walt Dohrn

Episodes.Title: Squidville
Episodes.Plot: Squidward is fed up with living next to Spongebob and Patrick, so he finds new neighbors who are more like himself. But then he begins to get bored and begins playing with a reef blower and causes all sort of trouble.
Episodes.Writer: Merriweather Williams, Walt Dohrn
Episodes.GuestStars: Dee Bradley, Baker and Rodger Bumpass as Tentacle Acres guards

Episodes.Title: No Free Rides
Episodes.Plot: To avoid another year with SpongeBob in her class, Mrs. Puff passes him with bogus extra credit and lets him have his license, but soon realizes that the consequences are beyond bad. When SpongeBob receives a new boat-mobile from his parents, Mrs. Puff attempts to steal it, and SpongeBob will stop at nothing to stop her.
Episodes.Writer: Aaron Springer, C.H. Greenblatt, Doug Lawrence

Episodes.Title: I'm Your Biggest Fanatic
Episodes.Plot: While at a jellyfishing fan convention, SpongeBob meets Kevin C. Cucumber, who gives him a chance to see if he can join his club, The Jellyspotters. However, SpongeBob is unaware that Kevin is only trying to make a fool out of him, but soon discovers the truth after the club attacks him with a robotic queen jellyfish.
Episodes.Writer: Jay Lender, William Reiss, Doug Lawrence

Episodes.Title: Shanghaied
Episodes.Plot: When a giant anchor falls onto SpongeBob's house, Squidward, SpongeBob and Patrick decide to climb the anchor, and they find the boat of the Flying Dutchman and he imprisons them.
Episodes.Writer: Aaron Springer, C.H. Greenblatt, Merriwether Willi

Episodes.Title: Gary Takes A Bath
Episodes.Plot: The day that Gary has to take a bath arrives, but Gary doesn't want to take a bath, and SpongeBob tries everything possible to make sure he takes a bath.
Episodes.Writer: Aaron Springer, Merriweather Williams, C. H. Green
